title: Effect of drug on melanoma cells Set Member 3

content.question: Based on the information presented, which of the following best explains why the researchers measured oxygen consumption as an indicator of the effectiveness of drug <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: Oxygen provides the source of electrons for cellular respiration and is necessary for energy production.
Oxygen consumption increases the mutation rate and causes cells to become cancerous.
Oxygen activates apoptosis, which results in the death of melanoma cells.
Oxygen accepts electrons in oxidative phosphorylation, a process necessary for melanoma cell survival.

content.answer: Oxygen accepts electrons in oxidative phosphorylation, a process necessary for melanoma cell survival.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
